p: Among 70 Thai medicinal plants, seven medicinal plants namely, M. alba, C. nardus, C. rotundus, C. sappan, E. longifolia, T. triandra, and A. concinna were selected as candidates after the first round of screening. These medicinal plants were then subjected to a second round of screening using the same assays but at different concentrations, in addition to a cell viability assay, to select promising candidates.
